title: Image to PDF Converter - Free Online Tool | WikiHowTo.click
sub_title: Convert JPG or PNG images to PDF online with high quality, professional layout, and no watermarks.

description:
Quickly transform images to PDF with our free online converter. Upload JPG or PNG images and get a professional-quality PDF in seconds. Perfect for portfolios, documents, receipts, scanned pages, and more.

No signup required, no watermarks, and secure processing. Each image becomes a page in your PDF file, ensuring consistent layout across devices. Files are automatically deleted after conversion for maximum privacy.

h1.title: Convert Image to PDF Online
h1.description: Free and fast Image to PDF converter. Supports JPG and PNG images with professional layout, instant download, and no signup required.

h2.title: Why Convert Images to PDF?
h2.description:
• Professional Layout: Create polished PDFs suitable for business, school, or personal use.
  • Universal Compatibility: PDFs display consistently on all devices and platforms.
  • Easy Sharing: Send PDFs via email, messaging apps, or cloud storage.
  • Print Ready: Optimized for high-quality printing.
  • Organized Documents: Combine multiple images into one PDF file.

h2.title: How to Convert Images to PDF
h2.description:
1. Click Upload Images and select JPG/PNG files.
  2. Arrange them in the order you want.
  3. Click Convert to PDF and download instantly.

Our tool automatically optimizes size and quality for professional results.

h2.title: Perfect Use Cases
h2.description:
• Portfolios: Photography, design, and art collections.
  • Business Documents: Reports, receipts, scanned forms.
  • Presentations: Create simple image-based slideshows.
  • Archiving: Store and organize images securely in PDF format.
  • Printing: Prepare for high-quality printouts.

h2.title: Features of Our Image to PDF Converter
h2.description:
• 100% Free and unlimited conversions
  • No watermarks or hidden costs
  • Supports JPG and PNG images
  • Batch conversion & merge support
  • High-quality, professional PDF output
  • Secure processing with auto-deletion
  • Works on Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android

faq.question: Is the Image to PDF converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, completely free with no watermarks or charges.

faq.question: Which image formats are supported?
faq.answer: We support JPG and PNG formats for best results.

faq.question: Will I lose quality when converting?
faq.answer: No, the converter preserves image quality and optimizes for PDF.

faq.question: What is the maximum file size?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 100MB per conversion.

faq.question: Are my files secure?
faq.answer: Yes, all uploads are encrypted and deleted automatically after processing.

faq.question: Can I merge multiple images into one PDF?
faq.answer: Yes, simply upload multiple images and they will be combined into one PDF.

faq.question: What page size is used?
faq.answer: Default is A4 with margins, but images are fit-to-page automatically.

faq.question: Can I edit the PDF after conversion?
faq.answer: The PDF will contain your images as pages. For editing, use a PDF editor.

note: Note: For advanced layouts or image editing, use dedicated PDF software. This tool is optimized for quick single/multi-image to PDF conversion.
